biography: Andrea-Nichole was born in Phoenix, Arizona to Mother Darlene Olivas. At a young age Andrea-Nichole and her mother moved to San Diego, California; it was there that she knew, that she wanted to be an actress. Starring in little productions, tap dancing and ballet classes at the age of 4. Continuing on quite a few years and moves later, Andrea-Nichole and her mother ended back in Phoenix, Arizona. It was in her hometown that she started broadening her acting skills on more of a serious level. In the year 2007 Andrea-Nichole moved to Los Angeles, California- it was there that she began TV/film acting. Sadly enough Andrea-Nichole's mother Darlene passed away after a long battle to Non-Hodgkins Lymphoma in May of 2010. Only a month after her mother passed, Andrea-Nichole was offered a part in a PSA "Stand Up To Cancer". She has continued acting and adding roles to her resume such as "Sirk", "Incest: The Musical", and other Blinky Production movies.
name: Andrea-Nichole Olivas
